visual_style: Live-action prehistoric survival with a naturalistic docu-drama tone and epic vistas. Lighting: sun/overcast, fire/ember glow, moonlight; smoke, dust, and fog used as organic diffusion—no modern fixtures. Earthy palette (ochre, umber, charcoal, moss green; cool dawn/blue hour). Weathered skin with dirt, sweat, scars; cracked hands; tangled hair; ritual pigments (charcoal/ochre). Authentic props (bone/stone/wood tools, sinew lashings), hand-stitched hides/fibers; no metal or plastic. Camera: real-lens behavior 18–85 mm, low near-ground angles, shoulder/handheld with gentle drift; slow push-ins; occasional crane/aerial for migrations; shallow DOF for close work, deep focus for landscapes; 24 fps, 180° shutter, subtle film grain. Sound: rich ambience (wind, grass, insects, water, distant animals, fire crackle); foley of leather/stone/bone; minimal percussive score (skin drums, bone flutes). Grading: restrained contrast, natural skin tones, patina of age.
